Drawings to ESBI Standards See also customer SLD PE689-D565-001-001-004 Note this project is similar to the existing Kildare Project factory number 803039 except for items listed below for each typical

This is a new ESBI EGIP Standard 4.0 which has an extra Metering panel and different protection relays (now 2 off 7SJ8042) on panel JZ01 to what was provided on previous ESBI EGIP STANDARD 2.4 Last EGIP 2.4 Project was Stephenson EGIP Factory Number 984969

Drawings to ESBI Standards,See also customer SLD PE492-D041-065-001-001 with mark up,Note this project is similar to the existing Charleville Project factory number 915342 ,Using remote RTU with 24V DC Interposing relays,Note new anti-pumping device to be used on circuit breaker,Interposing open and close relays K21/K22 types changed
